episode_event_ch0133_90_shilver_special/: Well, aren’t you good. I like that in a Trainer.
That is only the selfish perception of people.

Truly skilled Trainers should try to win with the
Pokémon they love best.
I like your style. You understand what’s important.
I knew you had what it takes to make it this far.
But...your little win streak ends here.

My Pokémon and I have gotten so much stronger
as Neo Champions, you won’t even recognize us...
I lost, but I’m not mad about it...
I’m gonna figure out why I lost and get stronger.

And when I do, we’re gonna come at you with
everything we’ve got...and take you down.

Don’t forget to let your Pokémon rest and recover
after battling.
